message: Hey Bob, let's make a deal. This offer gets us both something!
Let's split it in a way that we both get significant amounts. This seems fairer than your initial offer.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. This offer is a good compromise - better for both of us than continuing to go back and forth.
I see we're getting closer. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer. Let's settle on this to avoid further back-and-forth.
Bob, I'm aiming for a fair deal.  This is halfway between our last two offers and a good compromise.  Let's wrap this up.
